title: So uhh... How do you delete threads.....
body: I have absolutely no clue how that got there....

replies.body:
At the bottom of the main post, above the comments section, there should be 3 options; Quote, Edit, Delete.

https://i.gyazo.com/14ec918f0b51e7f269b91b11cb4dbe39.png
Oh wow. Is that there for mobile? Because it's so easy to see but I swear it wasn't there when I was on my phone

Oops! Sorry for the late reply. Thankfully Seph is a regular for this region :3

Let me know if it appears on the Desktop version but not Mobile so I know next time.
It might not be visible on the mobile theme of the site, I'm unsure. but you can switch to the desktop version of the site on your mobile and view it that way.
